questions.question: What language was the original RuneScape coded in?
questions.msgCorrect: It was Java. The Gower brothers originally created RuneScape Classic all the way back in 2001! The game is alive today and is celebrating 20 years of being around, how incredible is that?
questions.msgWrong: This information exists on the internet, it might be closer than you think

questions.question: What fishing level do you need to catch raw tuna with a harpoon?
questions.msgCorrect: It is level 35. You can fish them at 55 Fishing without a harpoon if you have unlocked the Barbarian ways of barehanded fishing! Either way you'll get 80 Fishing experience!
questions.msgWrong: The skillguide in game provides all required levels for content within RuneScape

questions.question: What NPC in Draynor Village will sell you rope for either 15 coins or 4 balls of wool?
questions.msgCorrect: It was Ned. He lives in a house on the eastern side of Draynor Village, just north of the bank. You'll interact with him during Dragon Slayer quest but you can also get rope from him!
questions.msgWrong: You talk to this NPC during the Dragon Slayer quest

questions.question: What NPC in Varrock gives you breathing salts in exchange for an airtight pot during the One Small Favour quest?
questions.msgCorrect: It was the Apothecary. He works in a building south west of Varrock Centre, just south of the bank. You'll interact with him during One Small Favour but also in Dimension of Disaster: Curse of Arrav.
questions.msgWrong: This NPC can also make potions for you if brought the correct ingredients

questions.question: Who do you talk to buy the Trimmed Completionist Cape?
questions.msgCorrect: It was the Museum Guard. He works in Varrock museum, on the top floor. You interact with him and ask about the mysterious cape and he'll give you a description of the cape's history. There are a lot of requirements for this cape, making it prestigious.
questions.msgWrong: Hint: They're surrounded by lots of artefacts from time gone by

questions.question: What Prayer level do you need to use the Protect from Melee prayer?
questions.msgCorrect: It was 43. Back in the day protection prayers granted 100% protection from that style, now they provide a 50% reduction to the hit. Despite this protection prayers are still widely used in RuneScape PVM today.
questions.msgWrong: The skill guide ingame provides all required levels for content within RuneScape

questions.question: In what year was the Grand Exchange released?
questions.msgCorrect: It was 2007. Prior to this update the only trades that existed were player to player either through ingame or the forums. It provided a way for players to acquire items they required in an easier fashion.
questions.msgWrong: It was released the same year as the God Wars Dungeon

questions.question: What is the Fairy ring code for McGrubor's Wood?
questions.msgCorrect: It was ALS. To access the Fairy ring network you must start A Fairy Tale II - Cure A Queen and it provides a fantastic way of getting around the RuneScape map
questions.msgWrong: Once you travel to a Fairy ring location, the information is shown next time you use the Fairy ring

questions.question: What do you need to pay a farmer to look after a patch with a magic tree in it?
questions.msgCorrect: It was 25 coconuts. When you plant something in a farming patch, you can pay the farmer to look after your crops so they will not get diseased. There are exceptions to this but it is true for the majority
questions.msgWrong: The skill guide ingame provides all required levels for content within RuneScape

questions.question: What level do you need in 10 different skills for the quest Plagues End?
questions.msgCorrect: It was 75. The skills you need are: Agility, Construction, Crafting, Dungeoneering, Herblore, Mining, Prayer, Ranged, Summoning and Woodcutting. Completion of this quest grants access to Prifddinas, which is one of the most useful unlocks in RuneScape today.
questions.msgWrong: The Quest guide ingame provides all requirements for Quests within RuneScape

questions.question: Where can you obtain a Grand seed pod?
questions.msgCorrect: It was Gnome Restaurant. You can talk to Aluft Gianne Junior on the 1st floor (UK) on the western side to start this minigame. You learn about gnome cooking and deliver food to gnomes throughout RuneScape for various rewards including the Grand seed pod and the Gnome Scarf.
questions.msgWrong: Those gnomes have big stomachs don't they?

questions.question: What runes are required to teleport to Trollheim?
questions.msgCorrect: It was 2 Law 2 Fire. You unlock this teleport after completing Eadgar's Ruse quest. It will teleport you to the centre of Trollheim and is used for herb runs and questing.
questions.msgWrong: The teleport tab in the Magic abilities interface ingame provides all requirements for Quests within RuneScape

questions.question: What is the name of the Construction pet?
questions.msgCorrect: It was Baby Yaga's House. You unlock this skilling pet whilst training Construction. Some activities do not award the chance to roll for the pet such as protean planks and Royal Battleship kits.
questions.msgWrong: The pet interface ingame has a filter to show all pets within RuneScape and how to obtain them

questions.question: What was the 100th quest to be released in RuneScape?
questions.msgCorrect: It was Recipe for Disaster. This quest was released back on the 15th March 2006! It was a sequel to the first quest ever released in RuneScape and a staple in any player's beginning experience, Cook's Assistant.
questions.msgWrong: You make some interesting food in this quest

questions.question: What ingredients do you need to make a Brightfire potion?
questions.msgCorrect: It was Super antifire (4) and Prayer Renewal (4). It is one of the combination potions released with Prifddinas and requires you to buy a recipe from Lady Meilyr for 600,000gp.
questions.msgWrong: The skill guide ingame provides all required levels for content within RuneScape

questions.question: In what year was the 'Falador Massacre'?
questions.msgCorrect: It was 2006. When Cursed You was due to be the first player to achieve 99 Construction, he hosted a party in his player owned house. Upon the level up and due to the amount of messages, people were booted out of his house and those who had engaged in combat activities had somehow retained the ability to attack players and in turn abused this thus dubbing this event the Falador Massacre.
questions.msgWrong: It was on the 6th June and is known as a triple number glitch

questions.question: In which city is Jagex based?
questions.msgCorrect: It was Cambridge. Founded in 1999, that was 22 years ago! They came up with Jagex as they wanted to be a company of Java Gaming Experts specialzing in browser based Java games. They released RuneScape in January 2001 and it has only grown since.
questions.msgWrong: Maybe their website has this information?

questions.question: In what quest do you meet Arnold Lydspor?
questions.msgCorrect: It was Arnold Lydspor. During Swan Song you help the Piscatoris Fishing Colony and its inhabitants fight off the sea troll invasion, among which is Arnold Lydspor who ends up being a bank and general store after the quest.
questions.msgWrong: I'm sure the Wise Old Man is thankful for your help fighting those trolls!

questions.question: In what quest do help Bob find items for Neite?
questions.msgCorrect: It was a Tail of Two Cats. During this quest you learn about the life of Bob the cat. Neite is his lover and you must find him items so he can woo her, you also complete tasks to help out Bob's owner, Unferth.
questions.msgWrong: You help two NPCs find love, it's furry fun!

questions.question: Which one of these is an elite skill?
questions.msgCorrect: It was Invention. To even unlock this skill you require level 80 in Divination, Smithing and Crafting. You can then start the Invention tutorial north of Falador in the Invention Guild.
questions.msgWrong: This skill was released early 2016

questions.question: What Fishing level do you require to enter the Fishing Guild?
questions.msgCorrect: It was 68. Once you have this Fishing level you can enter the guild north of the Ardougne lodestone. It provides a multitude of Fishing locations and access to the Deep Sea Fishing platform.
questions.msgWrong: The skill guide ingame provides all required levels for content within RuneScape

questions.question: What Woodcutting level do you need to chop down a Yew tree?
questions.msgCorrect: It was 60. Yews can be found in multiple locations around the world of Gielinor, most notably west of Catherby bank, south of Edgeville bank and in the Crwys district of Prifddinas.
questions.msgWrong: The skill guide ingame provides all required levels for content within RuneScape

questions.question: What quest must you get a portion of the way through to acquire the sword Excalibur?
questions.msgCorrect: It was Merlin's Crystal. This is a quest in which you work with King Arthur to help free Merlin who, like all amazing magicians is stuck inside a crystal.
questions.msgWrong: This quest is one of the early quests in the Camelot series

questions.question: What Kingdom is Darkmeyer located in?
questions.msgCorrect: It was Morytania. After the Branches of Darkmeyer, you have access to this city and have access to the Blisterwood tree which can be used to create weapons which can damage vampyres.
questions.msgWrong: Vampyres love this place!

questions.question: What quest unlocks the ability to use the curse Soul Split at level 92 Prayer?
questions.msgCorrect: It was Temple at Senntisten. After completing this quest you gain access to the ancient curses prayer book which contains many useful curses that are widely used in today's RuneScape, most notably the deflect prayers and superheat/light form.
questions.msgWrong: The skill guide ingame provides quest requirements for all content within RuneScape

questions.question: Where are Mizgog, Grayzag, Sedridor and Traiborn located?
questions.msgCorrect: It was Wizards' Tower. You speak to these wizards and others in multiple quests including Rune Mysteries, Rune Memories and Imp Catcher.
questions.msgWrong: Maybe those blue clothed people need your help?

questions.question: In which archaeological site can you find the ‘Smoke Cloud’ spell scroll artefact?
questions.msgCorrect: It was Kharid-Et. It is found whilst excavating Culinarum debris. It can be excavated and restored at level 100 Archaeology.
questions.msgWrong: Maybe Zaros used this back in the day?

questions.question: How do you unlock the Port Life achievement? (POP = Player Owned Ports)

answers.answer: By reaching the first region in POP
By unlocking your first captain in POP
By reaching the final region in POP

questions.msgCorrect: It was by completing the Player Owned Ports tutorial. To start, you need level 90 in one of the Ports skills (Agility, Construction, Cooking, Divination, Dungeoneering, Fishing, Herblore, Hunter, Prayer, Runecrafting, Slayer or Thieving).
questions.msgWrong: Maybe someone can help show you around?

questions.question: What is a Jumper?
questions.msgCorrect: It was a node in Runespan. They require 54 Runecrafting as you receive law runes when siphoning from them. They appear on the upper floor and rarely on the middle floor.
questions.msgWrong: You can receive law runes from it

questions.question: What region does completing 'Impressing the Locals' quest grant you access to?
questions.msgCorrect: It was the Arc. The Arc provides a wide variety of content across Fishing, Hunter, Farming, Divination and Woodcutting with some of the highest level skill nodes being found on uncharted isles.
questions.msgWrong: You end up sailing to the area you unlocked
